snippet.title: Space Station Loma: Operations - Steam Early Access Official Launch Trailer [VR, HTC Vive]
snippet.description:
We are now on steam \o/
On 2017-03-18 00:00am MEZ we went live on steam early access with version 0.2.0 and this is the first trailer.
Yes, the footage in the trailer was already a bit (one week) outdated, but only by things not visible to the not developer eyes ;)

-----------

• Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/577640
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/StationLoma
• Web: http://spacestationloma.com
